Statute.Title: National Security and Intelligence Committee of Parliamentarians Act
Statute.OtherLangTitle: (Comité des parlementaires sur la sécurité nationale et le renseignement, Loi sur le)

Minister.Text: Leader of the Government in the House of Commons (SI/2017-64)

CIF.Text: CIF, 2017, c. 15 (assent: 22.06.2017) the Act and its schedule in force 06.10.2017 see SI/2017-63.

Item.Text: — s. 57 in force on the 60th day after the day on which the Countering Foreign Interference Act receives royal assent see s. 75 (19.08.2024)
— s. 115 comes into force on a day to be fixed by order of the Governor in Council see s. 117 — Not in force

CIF.Text: CIF, 2024, c. 25, ss. 132 to 135 come into force on a day or days to be fixed by order of the Governor in Council see s. 146 — Not in force
